MEANHack '16 | 9 Days to go!
A memo for you to get into action
December 16th, 2016
08:00 AM IST
Miracle Heights
Dear,
Hope you are all set and ready with your teams for the MEANHack @ Digital Summit 2016 on December 16th, 2016 at 08:00 AM IST at Miracle Heights, Rushikonda, Visakhapatnam to showcase your talent in the battle field. If you are not ready yet, then here is a wakeup call for you to pull up your socks and speed your wheel up before it's too late as the teams are gonna be wise.
MEANHack is a 24 hour event where Miracle with its team of experts assists you with a chance to showcase your talent by providing you with all the necessities to give you maximum comfort including refreshments, free wifi, and technical tutorials.
Don't Forget to Bring Along!!
  • Ensure that you make your presence by 08:00 AM IST at the event along with your Laptops
  • Get your laptops installed with Node JS, Express JS, Cordova, Ionic, Git, and Node-RED
  • Make sure that your laptops are also installed with an Editor preferably "Atom" or "Notepad++"
  • If required you can also bring materials for a quick reference
For any questions please reach out to innovation@miraclesoft.com
